ingredients.item: 340g pack essential Waitrose British Beef Frying Steak

instructions.step: Spread the steak with mustard on both sides and season with black pepper. Heat a griddle pan and fry the steak for 2-3 minutes on each side (for medium). Allow to rest, then cut into slices.
Mix together the oil, vinegar, herbs and capers to make a salsa verde. Toss half into the salad and divide between 2 plates, top with the steak, then spoon over the remaining salsa verde.
